p: Breakdown of hydrogen peroxide or other organic hydroperoxides into non-toxic products is achieved by GST and GPx alongside GSH ( Agrawal et al., 2015). GST level in STZ-IND rats were lowered in the liver (86.1%) and kidney (77.7%) homogenates compared with the NC group ( Fig. 3A and 3B). However, PBEs and beverage blends exhibited potent antioxidant activity, since they increased GST activity in the treated groups. Notably, CHPBE-2 exhibited a significant antioxidant effect, observed by improved GST activity in the livers (518%) and kidneys (351%) of treated diabetic rats. These values were significantly higher than those of the synthetic drug treated group (STZ+ACA).
